channel.title: Zombie Minigame!
channel.description:
Yeah, I need help with this. So many people are looking for this, I tried to solve my own problems. Pondering new thoughts to find a shortcut, but the problem with shortcuts, is that they always go wrong.
I need some help with this, maybe a hint would be nice. Atleast a kind response, a token of gratitude. Something I can work with here.
The problem I'm having is that I can not get the next wave to start, and I don't want it to spawn 30 npc's in the first wave, cause that is just way too lame. I've looked everywhere, and fully copied and changed every "FightCaves" entree, to work for Zombies. It's still a no go.
Feel free to inbox me, help me out or simply post here. If you're going to offer to sell anything related to this, I'm not purchasing anything. (I'm broke at the moment).

item.title: Zombie Minigame!
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

Lmfao, got the first wave to repeat it self, maybe I’m getting closer.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Minigame!
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“Encryption, post:3, topic:407016”][quote author=mrpyro3 link=topic=503996.msg3687475#msg3687475 date=1311927895]

Yeah, I need help with this. So many people are looking for this, I tried to solve my own problems. Pondering new thoughts to find a shortcut, but the problem with shortcuts, is that they always go wrong.

I need some help with this, maybe a hint would be nice. Atleast a kind response, a token of gratitude. Something I can work with here.

The problem I’m having is that I can not get the next wave to start, and I don’t want it to spawn 30 npc’s in the first wave, cause that is just way too lame. I’ve looked everywhere, and fully copied and changed every “FightCaves” entree, to work for Zombies. It’s still a no go.

Feel free to inbox me, help me out or simply post here.
If you’re going to offer to sell anything related to this, I’m not purchasing anything. (I’m broke at the moment).

Try copying the Jad minigame? Or create and event.
[/quote]

Trust me I tried, I also even tried twisting around the PC-Minigame, and make it spawn waves. Nothing is working, do you have any more ideas? [/quote]
The only thing I can say is try making an event for it that tells the next wave to come.

Read full topic
